project.name: React project
project.description: I completed this project using React to build an application based on a supplied design and an existing API. The application included features such as pagination, search, and filters, and had a responsive front-end. I utilized a CSS framework to create a modern UI that interacted seamlessly with the API.

project.name: Collectors App
project.description: I created a collectors app that allows collectors to share their collections with friends, add, remove and edit items in their collection.

project.name: Laravel API
project.description: I built a well-architected API that works with a pre-built React front-end application.
